Posts.Content: This has made me realise how rare it is, thank you again for your help and advice
Posts.Title: Phyllodes Sarcoma of the breast

Posts.Content: Thanks Laura, think I've requested to join that group. I will double check. Sounds the perfect place for the information we are looking for. Becky x
Posts.Title: Phyllodes Sarcoma of the breast

Posts.Content: Hi all. My mum has just been diagnosed with Phyllodes Sarcoma of the breast and it is malignant. I have read the leaflet and the consultant has said it's rare but apart from that we don't know much more. We are finding out today if it's spread anywhere else. I just wondered if anyone on here has been diagnosed with the same type of cancer?
Posts.Title: Phyllodes Sarcoma of the breast
